questions.question: What is a block diagram?
options: A graphical representation of a system's components and their interactions
A graph of the frequency response of a system
A graph of the time response of a system
A graph of the state-space model of a system
questions.answer: A graphical representation of a system's components and their interactions

questions.question: What is the purpose of a block diagram in control systems?
options: To visualize the functional relationships between components
To analyze the frequency response of the system
To determine the time response of the system
To calculate the stability of the system
questions.answer: To visualize the functional relationships between components
